summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1423, for the improvement of Thirtieth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Columbia Street to East Denny Way, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15519 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
